job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We have an exciting new job opening for a Generative AI Scientist in our Rapid Response Team. We are looking for a creative candidate who thrives on curiosity and learning, who has a passion to innovate, and enjoys a challenge. If you are that kind of scientist consider joining our team of thinkers and doers to drive innovation at the intersection of discovery and action!

   This position is in our Eindhoven-based Rapid Response Team (RRT), part of the Data and AI group at Thermo Fisher Scientific. The RRT is a multidisciplinary team focused on unlocking Generative AI's potential for customer products and R&D processes. The team moves quickly, progressing from ideation to proof of concept within four weeks.

   As a creative force in the RRT, you'll explore and showcase new GenAI technologies for future products and processes. Your role involves iterating on prototypes, validating assumptions, and preparing demos and reports. You'll collaborate with AI specialists, marketing, IT & SW Digital specialists, and partner teams, sharing results and insights across the organization., * Develop and propose compelling proof-of-concepts for application of generative AI in customer products or R&D process improvements.
     * Keep up to date with the latest advancements in the field of Generative AI and disseminate that learning in the team.
     * Collaborate closely with the AI teams across Thermo Fisher Scientific to define and integrate next generation AI methods into our customers products.
     * Drive patent generation in your field of expertise.
job_details.full_text:
Engineer III, Artificial Intelligence

We have an exciting new job opening for a Generative AI Scientist in our Rapid Response Team. We are looking for a creative candidate who thrives on curiosity and learning, who has a passion to innovate, and enjoys a challenge. If you are that kind of scientist consider joining our team of thinkers and doers to drive innovation at the intersection of discovery and action!

   This position is in our Eindhoven-based Rapid Response Team (RRT), part of the Data and AI group at Thermo Fisher Scientific. The RRT is a multidisciplinary team focused on unlocking Generative AI's potential for customer products and R&D processes. The team moves quickly, progressing from ideation to proof of concept within four weeks.

   As a creative force in the RRT, you'll explore and showcase new GenAI technologies for future products and processes. Your role involves iterating on prototypes, validating assumptions, and preparing demos and reports. You'll collaborate with AI specialists, marketing, IT & SW Digital specialists, and partner teams, sharing results and insights across the organization., * Develop and propose compelling proof-of-concepts for application of generative AI in customer products or R&D process improvements.
     * Keep up to date with the latest advancements in the field of Generative AI and disseminate that learning in the team.
     * Collaborate closely with the AI teams across Thermo Fisher Scientific to define and integrate next generation AI methods into our customers products.
     * Drive patent generation in your field of expertise.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes 'Generative AI', 'GenAI technologies', and 'large language models' (implied by GenAI). It focuses on developing proof-of-concepts, iterating on prototypes, and building applications for customer products and R&D processes, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer. The mention of 'LangChain' and 'LangGraph' further supports this classification, as these are key frameworks for GenAI development.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves exploring and showcasing new GenAI technologies, iterating on prototypes, and developing proof-of-concepts for generative AI applications.
job_tasks.phrase: explore and showcase new GenAI technologies

job_tasks.justification: The role involves developing proof-of-concepts for application of generative AI in customer products or R&D process improvements.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop and propose compelling proof-of-concepts for application of generative AI in customer products or R&D process improvements.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves iterating on prototypes and preparing demos, which are part of the software development lifecycle for AI applications.
The role involves preparing demos and reports, which are outputs of software development and integration efforts.
The role requires understanding the potential of Generative AI for customer products and R&D processes, aligning technical solutions with business needs.
job_tasks.phrase: unlocking Generative AI's potential for customer products and R&D processes

job_tasks.justification: The role involves collaborating with marketing and SW Digital specialists to integrate AI methods into products, requiring an understanding of business context and stakeholder needs.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with AI specialists, marketing, IT & SW Digital specialists, and partner teams

job_tasks.justification: The role involves integrating next generation AI methods into customers products, which implies deployment and maintenance considerations.
job_tasks.phrase: integrate next generation AI methods into our customers products

soft_skills.phrase: Keep up to date with the latest advancements in the field of Generative AI and disseminate that learning in the team.
Collaborate with AI specialists, marketing, IT & SW Digital specialists, and partner teams, sharing results and insights across the organization.
Drive patent generation in your field of expertise.
